content: Former Singaporean constituency **Farrer Park Constituency** is a former constituency in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It existed from 1955 to 1980. ## Member of Parliament ElectionMember of ParliamentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)[**1955**](/wiki/1955_Singaporean_general_election)A. R. Lazarous[LF](/wiki/Labour_Front)[**1959**](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election)[A. P. Rajah](/wiki/A._P._Rajah)[Independent](/wiki/Independent_politician)[**1963**](/wiki/1963_Singaporean_general_election)S. R. Dharmarajoo[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)[**1968**](/wiki/1968_Singaporean_general_election)[Lee Chiaw Meng](/wiki/Lee_Chiaw_Meng)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[**1972**](/wiki/1972_Singaporean_general_election)[**1976**](/wiki/1976_Singaporean_general_election)[**1980**](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election) ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1955](/wiki/1955_Singaporean_general_election): Farrer Park PartyCandidateVotes%±%[LF](/wiki/Labour_Front)A.
